title: SOLD: (5) 1887-90 N172 Old Judge HOF Rookie Cards (SGC)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: (5) 1887-90 N172 Old Judge HOF Rookie Cards (SGC)
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very nice group of (5) 1887-90 N172 Old Judge Hall of Fame Rookie Cards in nice condition. Here is a list of the players:

Jake Beckley (SGC 40) @ $SOLD
Clark Griffith (SGC 40) @ $SOLD
Billy Hamilton (SGC 60) @ $SOLD
Tim Keefe (SGC 40) @ $SOLD
Wilbert Robinson (SGC 20) @ $SOLD

Please review scans below for condition details. I am selling each of these cards individually but please feel free to make a competitive offer on two or more if you are interested. The first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
BUMP due to final price reduction.
